reviewText: I never would have imagined that watching reruns would be something that I'd go out of my way to view again and again. However, as with other "Raymond" dvd's, this is the anticipated treat that I knew it would be. Treat yourself to a little fun!

reviewerName: K.S. "avid reader from the east coast"
reviewText: Didn't really get into ELR until I started watching the reruns on TVLand and TBS. This show is hilarious!!! My favorite episode so far is from Season four with Cousin Gerard. He is the same guy who played the loudmouth pharmacist on 'The Nanny' with Fran Drescher. Cousin Gerard is neurotic and a hypochondriac. The fact that Raymond seems annoyed with him even though his whole family thinks he acts JUST LIKE Gerard makes that particular episode all the more hilarious!!I love this show and I plan to buy ALL seasons!!!

reviewText: Love these DVDs.  this was one of the best shows on TV in the last 20 years. You never grow tired of watching these and it's great to have them handy as TV today doesn't have any sitcoms that come close to this show.  Now if only Amazon would offer all of the Seasons of  ' Designing  Women" . I would forever be indebted.

reviewText: Bravo to HBO video, for reducing the price of "Everybody Loves Raymond" to the point where season box sets can be sold as two-packs.  I first saw this at my local Target store. Got most of the seasons there, and seasons 3-4 here at Amazon, to further my collection.  My seller did a fine job of getting it to me sooner than I expected.  The condition was as good as promised, and the joy of both hearing commentaries, and seeing deleted scenes puts DVD ownership over the tube anytime.  Even on my low-res TV, the quality is pristine, and the inclusion of a TV museum event where the cast and crew appeared is a bonus for anybody as interested in the creators of this show, as well as the actors.  (Not since the Dick Van Dyke show, have I seen a show work the way "Raymond" did.)  ILFT finishing my collection soon, with the wonderful season 7.
Title: N/A
